name: Arcana Force XIX - The Sun
text:
1 Tuner monster + 1 non-Tuner "Arcana Force" monster
When this card is Summoned, flip a coin:
Heads - Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate that activation, and if you do, banish that card.
Tails - Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can tribute 1 "Arcana Force" monster; Shuffle 1 card on the field into the Deck.
